S:log-item.D:comment:
DERBY-3574: With client, attempting to get the lob length after commit or connection close if there was a call to length() before commit does not throw an exception. Merged revisions 647931, 648012 and 648180 from trunk to 10.4. These changes also fix DERBY-3469.
Patches contributed by Tiago R. Espinha (whitespace changes by Knut Anders Hatlen).
